## plugin

### ThunderPlugin

- Arguments: `{ Object } options`

- Usage: 

```javascript

const ThunderPlugin = require('@mtfe/thunder')

new ThunderPlugin({})

```

### ThunderPlugin@update

`ThunderPlugin` 实例在 state 更新时会触发 `update` 事件

- Arguments: 

- Usage: 

```javascript

const ThunderPlugin = require('@mtfe/thunder')

const plugin = new ThunderPlugin({})

plugin.on('update', (state) => {
  console.log(state)
})

```
